body_html:
Actually, I think the CUDA prompt is one of the ones I didn't update because of its complexity (and potential breakages due to change).

I replicated the loop with the same command:

docker build -f Dockerfile.devel-gpu github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git#master:tensorflow/tools/docker
body_text:
Actually, I think the CUDA prompt is one of the ones I didn't update because of its complexity (and potential breakages due to change).
I replicated the loop with the same command:
docker build -f Dockerfile.devel-gpu github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git#master:tensorflow/tools/docker
body:
Actually, I think the CUDA prompt is one of the ones I didn't update because of its complexity (and potential breakages due to change).

I replicated the loop with the same command:

```shell
docker build -f Dockerfile.devel-gpu github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow.git#master:tensorflow/tools/docker
```
